title: How to Create a Faux Paint Antique Finish

steps.headline: Clean item with a damp cloth.
Wipe item with a dry cloth to remove excess damp from step 1.
Paint with a base color.
steps.description: This will show through any cracks and aging marks.

steps.headline: Paint with a second color.
steps.description: This color will crack, letting the base color show.

steps.headline: Paint item with a clear sealant, available at most paint stores.

text: Clean item with a damp cloth.  Wipe item with a dry cloth to remove excess damp from step 1.  Paint with a base color. This will show through any cracks and aging marks. Let dry thoroughly.  Paint with crackle medium.  Let dry.  Paint with a second color. This color will crack, letting the base color show. Let dry thoroughly.  Paint item with a clear sealant, available at most paint stores.
